## RCrawler


```{r RCrawler}
library(httr)
url <- "https://ecshweb.pchome.com.tw/search/v3.3/?q=%E6%97%A5%E6%96%87%E8%BE%AD%E5%85%B8&scope=all"
res = GET(url)
res_json = content(res)
raw = (data.frame(do.call(rbind,res_json$prods)))
```

## My Results

```{r Table}
library(knitr)
kable(raw)
```
